about_the_game:
Long, long ago on a distant plane of existence, Adhar the Supreme God, sat alone in the primordial void.

Being able to shape matter and energy as he pleased, tired of floating alone in the depths of time, he decided to create the Eternal Flame which, thrown into the vortex of chaos, created a new world, Telluria, and a Divine Being, Teine, for its sustenance.

In subsequent eras Teine, considered Supreme God and venerated as such, led a rebellion against Adhar for dominion over Telluria.

Adhar's anger was terrible. He hurled his power over the world, sending fire from the sky, cataclysms, earthquakes.

All life was extinguished, cities and settlements razed. Earth and grass covered everything.

After a long time, life began to spring anew, but time and space were now torn apart.

Teine herself was punished. Adhar divided her into two halves, Vehra demigoddess of order and Celtia demigoddess of chaos, imprisoning them as soon as they were created on a celestial island adrift in the astral plane.

And it is at this point that Adhar unleashed a terrible curse, destined to definitively destroy the world, if his wrath had not been appeased somehow...

Annelise lives in the year 2100.

One morning like any other in a flame like any other, she sees a female figure identical to her.

From that moment his life will change.

She will learn of the existence of an ancient prophecy and an angry Supreme God,

she will have to study ancient books and face puzzles,

she will understand that she is part of something too big for her to handle.

But also that somewhere in time she will never be alone again.

Join Annelise in her quest to learn from the past to save the fate of two worlds.
Beware of the mysterious dark twin between the flame, leading the evil Dark Monks.
Meet unexpected friends and enemies throughout her journey.
Discover an original setting imbued with magic and lore.

Learn more about the Telluria project on our site.

Progressive power-up system. Unlock new abilities every stage to counter plagues through the Pyrite Talisman.

Telluria: Forebodings. A 3D graphic adventure with parallel realities, ancient vestiges and dark omens.
Italian and English languages supported.
The main game will crowdfund on October 2025. Make it happen. Support us at backerkit and get free stuff.

Help Annelise get and empower The Pyrite Talisman in the prequel, available for free on Steam.

name: Telluria: Forebodings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A 3D graphic adventure with parallel realities, ancient vestiges and dark omens. Play in two worlds and through two ages. Learn the past to shape the future. The fate of Telluria will rest on you.
